美国药典 (USP) 和 Mestrelab Research, SL (Mestrelab)美国药典 (USP) 和 Mestrelab Research, SL (Mestrelab) 很高兴地宣布，他们已达成合作，通过 Mestrelab 的 Mnova 平台提供 USP-ID。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240418/The-US-Pharmacopeia-(USP)-and-Mestrelab-Research-SL-(Mestrelab).aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240418/The-US-Pharmacopeia-(USP)-and-Mestrelab-Research-SL-(Mestrelab).aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bc028afd-0b4f-468e-93df-f86a67084ff3 Thu, 18 Apr 2024 08:54:00 -0400 The U.S. Pharmacopeia (USP) and Mestrelab Research, S.L. (Mestrelab)
B Medical Systems 的太阳能直接疫苗冰箱和冰袋冷冻机 TCW40SDD 获得 ACT 标签医疗冷链行业的领先企业 B Medical Systems 自豪地宣布，其太阳能直驱疫苗冰箱和冰袋冷冻机 TCW40SDD 已获得 My Green Lab 著名的 ACT 标签。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240418/B-Medical-Systemse28099-Solar-Direct-Vaccine-Refrigerator-and-Ice-Pack-Freezer-the-TCW40SDD-Receives-the-ACT-标签。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240418/B-Medical-Systemse28099-Solar-Direct-Vaccine-Refrigerator-and-Ice-Pack-Freezer-the-TCW40SDD-Receives-the-ACT-标签。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4263b105-98f8-4e2a-9307-07f921b9addc Thu, 18 Apr 2024 08:27:00 -0400 B Medical Systems’ Solar Direct Vaccine Refrigerator and Ice-Pack Freezer, the TCW40SDD, Receives the ACT Label
新试验显示免疫检查点阻断剂治疗早期肺癌的前景一种树突状细胞 (DC) 疫苗，针对已切除的非小细胞肺癌 (NSCLC) 患者的患者特异性新抗原。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240418/New-Trials-show-promise-for-immune-checkpoint-blockers-in-early-stage-lung-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240418/New-Trials-show-promise-for-immune-checkpoint-blockers-in-early-stage-lung-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0090afed-5734-40de-a3dc-4b01dfc9d26a Thu, 18 Apr 2024 08:23:00 -0400 New trials show promise for immune checkpoint blockers in early-stage lung cancer
探索蓝莓的好处：研究将提取物与减少认知衰老联系起来野生蓝莓提取物 (WBE) 可以提高认知能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240418/Exploring-the-benefits-of-blueberry-Studies-link-extract-to-reduced-cognitive-aging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240418/Exploring-the-benefits-of-blueberry-Studies-link-extract-to-reduced-cognitive-aging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=43560f11-c1cd-4002-98f3-838fd76cd22d Thu, 18 Apr 2024 07:09:00 -0400 Exploring the benefits of blueberries: Studies link extract to reduced cognitive aging
研究发现，季节性流感导致学校大量停课，尤其是在南部各州研究调查了 2011 年至 2022 年间美国学校因 11 个流感季节而关闭的情况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240418/Seasonal-influenza-triggers-significant-school-closures-special-in-southern-states-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240418/Seasonal-influenza-triggers-significant-school-closures-special-in-southern-states-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e8f03977-f519-42a1-ac52-697f49154e4a Thu, 18 Apr 2024 06:41:00 -0400 Seasonal influenza triggers significant school closures, especially in southern states, study finds
医疗保险推动改善慢性病护理吸引了企业，但医生并不多卡丽·莱斯特期待着每周四接到医生医疗助理的电话，询问她的情况如何以及是否需要补充处方药。助理为她提供有关应对焦虑和其他健康问题的建议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240418/Medicaree28099s-push-to-improve-chronic-care-attracts-businesses-but-not-many-doctors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240418/Medicaree28099s-push-to-improve-chronic-care-attracts-businesses-but-not-many-doctors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=716074fc-2750-4815-88b7-6b474a000654 Thu, 18 Apr 2024 06:34:12 -0400 Medicare’s push to improve chronic care attracts businesses, but not many doctors
更好的结核疫苗之路贯穿蒙大拿州蒙大拿州的一个研究小组在开发更有效的结核病疫苗方面发挥着关键作用，结核病是一种导致死亡人数最多的传染病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240418/The-path-to-a-better-tuberculosis-vaccine-runs-through-Montana.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240418/The-path-to-a-better-tuberculosis-vaccine-runs-through-Montana.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5c12943c-1c0c-4809-813f-76bc3648b64a Thu, 18 Apr 2024 06:31:59 -0400 The path to a better tuberculosis vaccine runs through Montana
Sphere Fluidics 任命 Edward Rayner 为非执行董事Sphere Fluidics 是一家领先的单细胞分析和分离微流体创新解决方案提供商，今天宣布任命 Ed Rayner 为其董事会非执行董事。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240418/Sphere-Fluidics-appoints-Edward-Rayner-as-Non-Executive-Director.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240418/Sphere-Fluidics-appoints-Edward-Rayner-as-Non-Executive-Director.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5e7f47ea-ee41-405a-b7ff-4d042fc858c8 Thu, 18 Apr 2024 02:29:00 -0400 Sphere Fluidics appoints Edward Rayner as Non-Executive Director

AI模型GPT-4超越非专业医生评估眼部问题的能力剑桥大学领导的一项研究发现，GPT-4的临床知识和推理能力正在接近专科眼科医生的水平。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240417/AI-model-GPT-4-exceeds-unspecialized-doctors-ability-to-assess-eye-problems.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240417/AI-model-GPT-4-exceeds-unspecialized-doctors-ability-to-assess-eye-problems.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=519cb0cf-a307-4497-ad5a-6bfa506f2b24 Wed, 17 Apr 2024 23:58:00 -0400 AI model GPT-4 exceeds unspecialized doctors' ability to assess eye problems
